title: Oil prices slip as OPEC+ reportedly plans another output hike

summary: Oil prices retreated in early Asian trade on Monday, edging lower after the resumption of crude exports from Iraq’s Kurdistan region and growing expectations that OPEC+ will approve another production increase in November. title: Porsche's EV Ambitions Stall After Steep Stock Drop
summary: Porsche AG shares fell almost 10% last week—the steepest drop since its 2022 debut—after the carmaker scaled back its electric-vehicle ambitions.
